subject: Football
Television
Freedom of Speech and Expression
lead_paragraph: A flap was bound to occur sometime in Bryant Gumbel’s tenure at the NFL Network - he is hyper-opinionated, and  was told no restrictions would be placed on him by the network.
snippet: A flap was bound to occur sometime in Bryant Gumbel’s tenure at the NFL Network - he is hyper-opinionated, and  was told no restrictions would be placed on him by the network.
